recipe.ingredients: - cottage cheese: 1 cup - cherry tomatoes: 1 cup - fresh basil (chopped): 2 tablespoons - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon - salt (optional): 1 pinch
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Halve the cherry tomatoes and chop the fresh basil. 2. Mix Ingredients: In a medium bowl, combine the cottage cheese with the halved cherry tomatoes and chopped basil. 3. Season: Sprinkle with black pepper and a pinch of salt if desired. 4. Serve: Enjoy this high-protein, refreshing snack immediately or chill in the refrigerator before serving for enhanced flavor.
